hero.title: RTTYS - Your Next-Gen Remote Terminal
hero.subtitle: Access any of your terminal devices from anywhere, securely and efficiently, right from your web browser.

web_based.title: Purely Web-Based
web_based.description: No client software needed. A modern browser is your all-in-one terminal.

secure.title: End-to-End Encryption
secure.description: All data streams are encrypted with TLS, ensuring your sessions are private and secure.

cross_platform.title: Cross-Platform Support
cross_platform.description: The server runs on Linux, macOS, OpenWRT, and more. Access from any device.

easy_deploy.title: Easy Deployment
easy_deploy.description: Built with C for minimal resource usage. Single binary with no dependencies.

file_transfer.title: File Transfer
file_transfer.description: Easily upload and download files between local and remote devices using the zmodem protocol.

access_control.title: Access Control
access_control.description: Configure whitelists to only allow authorized user IDs to log in, securing your devices.
